text: Stephen Kafoury (born October 4, 1941) is an American politician in the U.S. state of Oregon. He served in the Oregon House of Representatives and State Senate. He is a lawyer, having attended Lewis & Clark Law School, Whitman College, and Reed College. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1941 births Category:Politicians from Portland, Oregon Category:Reed College alumni Category:Lewis & Clark Law School alumni Category:Whitman College alumni Category:Oregon Democrats Category:Oregon state senators Category:Oregon lawyers Category:Members of the Oregon House of Representatives
title: Stephen Kafoury
